title: Migrate game design from v1 experiment
Design and document game development with AI team
description: Define the AI-led game development design and documentation approach: clarify roles, workflows, templates, tooling, review cadence, and risk/decision tracking to keep the AI team aligned and auditable.

title: Define AI team roles and RACI
description: List AI/human roles (design lead, gameplay, art, QA), decision boundaries, and review responsibilities.

title: Document AI-assisted workflow and cadence
description: Map phases (ideation, prototyping, playtesting, launch), entry/exit criteria, review cadence, logging expectations.

title: Game design doc template and outline
description: Draft a GDD template tailored to AI collaboration: vision, pillars, mechanics, progression, economy, UX, content pipeline, telemetry hooks, acceptance criteria.

title: Tooling and quality gates for AI team
description: Define repos/branching, prompt/library conventions, testing/linting gates, PR review rules, bd usage, decision & risk log process.

title: Install Perles tooling
description: Install and verify Perles from https://github.com/SorraTheOrc/perles; document setup steps and ensure availability for workflow definition work.

title: Create prompt for GDD creation
description: Create a reusable prompt (for Producer + agents) that generates a complete GDD using the template at docs/dev/gdd-template.md. The prompt should instruct agents to: (1) gather missing info via questions, (2) propose options with tradeoffs, (3) keep decisions explicitly marked for Producer approval, and (4) link the resulting GDD and any PRs back to the bd issue via comments.
